title-group.article-title: A Simple and Practical Method for Evaluating Machine Translation Quality

abstract.p: This article describes a simple and cost effective evaluation method based on post-editing. The results of an experiment using this method, to investigate the improvement of an MT system over time are given, along with some practicalities in carrying through the evaluation (time, effort etc.)
